siteMetadata.siteName: WPCampus: Where WordPress meets higher education

wordpressPage.title: Submit Conduct Report
wordpressPage.content:
WPCampus seeks to provide a friendly, safe environment in which all participants can engage in productive dialogue, sharing, and learning with each other in an atmosphere of mutual respect.

In order to promote such an environment, we require all participants to adhere to our code of conduct, which applies to all WPCampus interactions and events (whether online or in-person).

Please use this form if you witness, or are subject to, unacceptable behavior and would like to submit a report. You can submit your report anonymously or with your contact information. We obviously cannot follow up on an anonymous report with you directly, but we will fully investigate and take whatever action is necessary to prevent a recurrence.
